item.title: SSO for Azure AD
item.description: To configure SSO with an Azure AD Enterprise application, we provide a simple step-by-step solution below: Navigate to “Set up single sign on” in your Azure AD Enterprise application. In the Basic SAML Configuration, ensure that the settings match the following details Take the correct values for Identifier (Entity ID) and Reply URL from the Identity Provider configuration page. In the Attributes & Claims section, add a group claim with the following configuration and save it.
